item.title: riddles
item.description: Star 180° Notice that 43.7°+19.7°+18.2°+43°+55.4°=180°. Coincidence or not? Answer Draw the line AC. Notice that \( \angle DME = \angle AMC \).

item.title: The TCAND Problem in Query Optimization
item.description: The TCAND problem that I recently presented at ICDT and that we introduced with Hung Q.
